title: Metal Gear Solid Remake Rumor - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.23.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about the rumor that Metal Gear Solid is getting remade for PS5, Xbox's moves, and nuggs!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:56 - Housekeeping
Hades First Impressions is up! Youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
The most important Kinda Funny Podcast is up! youtube.com/kindafunny!
Speaking of youtube.com/kindafunny, after this show, We Have Cool Friends with Fantastic Beasts’ Dan Fogler posts, and right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames, Andy’s playing Super Mario Galaxy!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mohammed Mohammed
